method: 1. Mix all ingredients except ghee and garnishes to marinate for about 4 hours, then grind to form a smooth, thick paste.
2. Knead this mixture well and mix in the roasted gram and the egg.
3. Cover and refrigerate for another hour.
4. About 25 minutes before serving, shape the meat around the skewers and place the kebabs on to a grill over a drip tray, or in a pre-heated oven (also on a drip tray).
5. If cooking them over a charcoal grill, you will have to keep rotating them so that they brown and cook evenly.
6. They should take 15-20 minutes to cook.
7. Brush with ghee and cook another 2 minutes.
8. Serve garnished with chaat masala onions and the lemon and serve with green chutney.

title: Meat Lasagne Recipe
method: 1. Heat olive oil and saute garlic till slightly colored.
2. Add the tomato puree, salt, sugar, chilli powder, oregano, basil and simmer for a couple of minutes.
3. Heat butter and lightly brown flour in it.
4. Add milk, bring to a boil and simmer.
1. Mix together the meat, 1 1/2 cup of tomato sauce, and 2 cups of white sauce.
2. Spread a little tomato puree over the base of the dish.
3. Line the dish with a layer of the lasagne strips and spread a thin layer of meat mixture over it, then sprinkle some of the grated cheese.
4. Repeat these layers, till you have at least 5 such layers.
5. Cover the last layer with the white sauce and then dribble some tomato sauce over.
6. Sprinkle some cheese and bake in a pre-heated oven for 25-30 minutes.
7. Serve hot.

title: Cheese and Lamb Steaks Recipe
method: 1. Heat oil. Soften the onions; add tomatoes, garlic, bay leaf and thyme. Season and simmer.
2. Coat lamb in flour. Toss in beaten egg.
3. Combine crumbs, cheese and parsley.
4. Press over meat. Heat oil with butter and fry meat until tender, turning once.
5. Arrange in ovenproof dish.
6. Cover with mozzarella cheese. Bake at 200 degrees C for 10 minutes.
7. Serve with tomato sauce, garnished with basil leaves.

title: Turkey Breast with Orange Reduction Recipe
method: 1. Marinate turkey with garlic paste, chilli paste, yogurt, fresh coriander, salt and pepper for 4 hours.
2. Now heat oil in a pan and cook turkey supreme till done. Keep aside.
3. In a separate pan, saute the blanched spinach with chopped garlic. Keep aside.
1. Take a pan and saute garlic in olive oil.
2. Sprinkle chilli flakes and mix well.
3. Add tomato puree and cook for few minutes.
4. Now add orange juice, cook for 2 more minutes and keep aside.
1. Place sauteed spinach on the plate and place turkey supremes over it.
2. Pour some hot sauce and garnish with some crispy fried vermicelli.

title: Bataer (Quail) Rasedaar Recipe
method: 1. Heat oil in a pan, and add the zeera and the tej patta.
2. When the seeds begin to splutter, add the onions, garlic and ginger and sauté over high heat till brown.
3. Add the tomatoes and stir-fry till the fat separates, then add the yogurt, stir frying vigorously for it to blend well and not curdle.
4. Cook till fat separates and add the garam masala, salt, haldi, dhania powder and the chilli powder and mix well.
5. Keeping the heat high, add the bataer and turn around till opaque and fat separates.
6. Add 1 1/2 cups water, let it come to a boil, then lower the heat and simmer, uncovered till cooked through.
7. Serve hot garnished with the hara dhania.

title: Yakitori Skewer Recipe
method: 1. Take the lamb or chicken meat in a bowl, add the Soya sauce and the sugar. Marinate and refrigerate for an hour.
2. Thread the meat and the chopped onions onto the skewer.
3. Pour a few drops of oil on the lamb and grill till done.
1. Pour the Soya sauce in a pan, add the sugar and mirin.
2. Stir and add the sesame seeds.
3. Bring the sauce to a boil.
4. Garnish the lamb with roasted sesame seeds and serve with the sauce.

title: Laal Maas Recipe

ingredient.description: Meat, cut into curry style pieces 500 g, from the Raan
6-7 sabut lal mirch, soaked in water for 2 hours and ground fine

method: 1. Marinate meat in lassan (garlic), salt and laal mirch (red chilli) paste for 3-4 hours.
2. Heat the ghee in a pan and add the laung, elaichi, dal chini and kali mirch. Stir once then add the meat mixture over high heat.
3. Saute till opaque, then lower the heat and cook covered at the lowest heat till tender and fat separates.

title: Keema Samosa with Yogurt Dip Recipe
method: 1. Marinate the keema with ginger-garlic paste, red chilli powder, salt, turmeric, coriander powder, curd. Mix well and keep aside for 20 minutes.
2. Heat the oil, add the whole garam masala, sliced onions and saute until they turn a golden brown.
3. Add the marinated keema to the oil and cook well. Add the chopped ginger to the keema. Add the dry fruits.
1. Add salt to refined flour along with oil to make a stiff dough.
2. Portion into small balls. Roll into pancakes. Add the keema to pancake and shape (crescent shaped).
3. Fry till cooked.
1. Mix the hung curd, castor sugar, salt, cardamom powder, rose water and mix well.
